Package index

All functions

annotate_with_nearest()
Annotate RETSI peaks with nearest gene GETSI scores
biomart_genes()
Retrieve gene annotations from Ensembl via biomaRt
compute_entropy_getsi()
Compute normalized entropy of GETSI scores
compute_entropy_retsi()
Compute normalized entropy of RETSI scores
compute_getsi()
Compute GETSI scores on RNA data
compute_retsi()
Compute RETSI scores on ATAC peaks

Read input data from a file path
